title: Lake.of.Fire.2006.DVDRip.XviD.AC3.avi
description: Filmmaker Tony Kaye best known for \"American History X\" has been working on LAKE OF FIRE for the past fifteen years and has made a film that is unquestionably the definitive work on the subject of abortion. Shot in luminous black and white which is in fact an endless palette of grays the film has the perfect aesthetic for a subject where there can be no absolutes no \&#039;right\&#039; or \&#039;wrong.\&#039; He gives equal time to both sides covering arguments from either extremes of the spectrum as well as those at the center who acknowledge that in the end everyone is \&#039;right\&#039; - or \&#039;wrong.\&#039; Featuring: Pat Buchanan Noam Chomsky Alan M. Dershowitz
